			[1885] tabpanel 'Reviews (12)'
				[1889] strong ''
					StaticText 'Customer Reviews'
				[1915] list ''
					[1916] listitem ''
						StaticText 'For the price, really worth it!'
						[1918] LayoutTable ''
							[1919] LayoutTableRow ''
								[1920] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '100%'
						StaticText "Then unit is very basic and reminds me of the old VHS camcorders. However, when you look at the general price of Night Vision equipment, this is really a good deal.Its light and can record videos or photos. There is a tripod screw hole at the bottom as well. Manual, even though translated to English, is easy to read and understand. The system is intuitive and not hard to grasp either.Lowest magnification is 5x and then you can zoom in from there.Works in the day with the lens cap on, and works great at night with the lens cap removed (It's an IR filter.) Dont'e remove lens cap during the day! Still testing battery life, so no opinion on that yet.Comfortable in my hand and the control pads at the top are easy to use with one hand.The picture is a little grainy and you do get motion blur if you sweep the camera around quickly at night. However I am not surprised given the price point as clearer cameras cost a bundle due to the internal electronics.But it clears up nicely if you keep the unit still. Like I say, its not the same as the million-dollar military night vision, but if you want a simple easy to use basic night vision setup, I do strongly recommend them. Shipping was also super fast and reliable. Really happy with mine."
						[1931] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[1933] strong ''
								StaticText 'Vincent Vd BergVincent Vd Berg'
						[1934] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[1936] time ''
								StaticText '4/22/23'
					[1937] listitem ''
						StaticText 'Great little monocular'
						[1939] LayoutTable ''
							[1940] LayoutTableRow ''
								[1941] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '80%'
						StaticText 'I was in the Army for 25 years and used night vision a lot. This competes with devices that cost thousands of dollars clear view easily focusing; pictures and video come out clear I am still learning the functions but for the basic functions they are pretty easy to use the price scared me a little because I thought it would perform like a cheap 100 dollar item so one night after a couple drinks I went ahead and ordered it have not been disappointed had the item for couple weeks so can’t comment on how long it will last but don’t see any red flags that look like points of failure'
						[1952] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[1954] strong ''
								StaticText 'Ted'
						[1955] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[1957] time ''
								StaticText '4/22/23'
					[1958] listitem ''
						StaticText 'great pouch and black and white vision'
						[1960] LayoutTable ''
							[1961] LayoutTableRow ''
								[1962] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '100%'
						StaticText 'This night vision monocular includes a pouch that is both a protective case for storage and for carrying. It has a thick loop on the back top for running a waist belt or clipping to a backpack. The pouch front pocket has enough room for the usb charing cable and lens wiping cloth. The same durable material is also used on the wrist and back palm strap for carrying this night vision scope. The buttons are clustered together on the top and are simple to learn and press so you do not have to keep looking at the top of scope then refocusing or finding what you were looking at. The led screen boots up with a space satellite image then goes to black white night mode. I am very impressed with how far you can see with a scope priced under $100.'
						[1973] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[1975] strong ''
								StaticText 'Will-Review4UWill-Review4U'
						[1976] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[1978] time ''
								StaticText '4/22/23'
					[1979] listitem ''
						StaticText 'Very Nice !!'
						[1981] LayoutTable ''
							[1982] LayoutTableRow ''
								[1983] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '100%'
						StaticText "Very nice product, I've always wanted a cost effective night vision scope to view the critters roaming around at night. I was surprised with all that was included: battery charger & cord, a re-chargeable battery, scope has a hand strap, a lens cleaning cloth & a soft carrying case with a shoulder strap. Note: you may want to order extra rechargeable lithium-ion batteries (type 16340 rated at 3.7 volts) & a charger that can handle a couple of these batteries, or more. Especially if you plan to do long viewing times. The battery is advertised to last up to 5 hours if the infra-red illumination isn't needed (when enough ambient light is available i.e. the moon, nearby street lights) & 2.5 hours when infra-red illumination from the scope is needed when using in total darkness. Note: I've seen a comment about using non-rechargeable batteries, if you opt for this, make sure the battery is rated for 3.7 volts (the ones I had seen were rated for only 3 volts). Also, it was recommended the supplied battery is charged for 10 hours before using your scope for the 1st time."
						[1994] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[1996] strong ''
								StaticText 'Amazon Customer'
						[1997] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[1999] time ''
								StaticText '4/22/23'
					[2000] listitem ''
						StaticText 'Whole new level of bird watching'
						[2002] LayoutTable ''
							[2003] LayoutTableRow ''
								[2004] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '100%'
						StaticText 'This monoscope has taken my bird watching to a new level! What started as a hobby quickly grew into a passion as I started learning about all of the different species near my home. The low light night vision on this monoscope provides amazing clarity for both photos and videos. I would say that during night use I can easily see birds and other wildlife that are 200+ meters away (that is the length of more than 2 football fields!). It has a 16340 rechargeable lithium battery, which is easily charged using the 1000mAh adapter or simply plugging it into my computer via the provided USB cable.\xa0Daytime use of the monoscope is unreal. Being able to clearly view wild life that is over 1000 meters away is something I had never experienced prior to owning this. The 8x digital magnification makes it look like I am right there seeing everything. The monoscope is extremely easy to travel with and now accompanies me to all of my favorite viewing spots. It comes with a convenient storage bag and the entire thing weighs less than a pound. I could not be happier with this monoscope purchase. From the clear HD videos and photos, to the excellent battery life, long distance viewing in both day and night times, plus the extreme lightweight and convenience, everything works flawlessly together to provide me with amazing experiences in nature.'
						[2015] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[2017] strong ''
								StaticText 'Family shopperFamily shopper'
						[2018] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[2020] time ''
								StaticText '4/22/23'
					[2021] listitem ''
						StaticText 'Decent Nightvision camera'
						[2023] LayoutTable ''
							[2024] LayoutTableRow ''
								[2025] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '100%'
						StaticText 'I have watched the Youtube about US army night combat. I want to have one to protect myself so that I bought this one.This one is good for outdoor activities. If you have a night vision camera, you will know the night vision. Basically it is a camera with a built-in screen. Considering the price, I will see it is good, it is hard to buy so many components such as screen, camera in this price. It has IR light and bright amplifier function.Reminder for all nightvision fans, night vision is useless in the bright night city...'
						[2036] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[2038] strong ''
								StaticText 'HiddenPawHiddenPaw'
						[2039] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[2041] time ''
								StaticText '4/22/23'
					[2042] listitem ''
						StaticText 'Overall a very good entry level night vision monocular'
						[2044] LayoutTable ''
							[2045] LayoutTableRow ''
								[2046] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '100%'
						StaticText 'This is a great night vision monocular device considering its versatile features.It comes with both photography and video taping functions. What is more, it is ready to use since there is already a microsd card inside the device so we do not need to buy another one and wait for the card. The device also has many other special features to explore for example we can adjust the IR exposure stuff.It is quite handy when I want to go camping or hunting. It makes dark night crystal clear so that we can have better vision on the animals around us. It can also be used as a security camera in the dark with the help of the large storage space.The travel bag makes the device compact to carry with in suitcases or backpacks. It also fits the hand ergonomics perfectly. Overall 5 stars.'
						[2057] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[2059] strong ''
								StaticText 'Lawrence XuLawrence Xu'
						[2060] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[2062] time ''
								StaticText '4/22/23'
					[2063] listitem ''
						StaticText 'One really impressive Night Vision Monocular'
						[2065] LayoutTable ''
							[2066] LayoutTableRow ''
								[2067] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '100%'
						StaticText 'I am very impressed with this night vision camera. Shipping was fast. The camera is light and easy to handle. The control buttons on top need to have some enlarged locator bumps to help locate the buttons by feel only. It takes pretty good day time pictures too. The night vision is really impressive. I own an expensive Gen 1 night vision camera and I prefer to use the NV01 because it is smaller and has better picture. You should purchase a pack of good CR123a batteries to carry with you if you do not have a way to recharge it. Battery life on a charge is around 2.5 hours. I really strongly recommend this camera to anyone wanting a good, low cost, quality camera. I am hoping that they will build a Night vision rifle scope. This one has a rail mount but it is not centered with the lense. It also does not have a cross hair. The button to take the picture needs to be a little easier to press. Even when zoomed out to zero x the camera will wiggle when trying to take a picture. This is still one of the best buys yet. I will be buying a second one.'
						[2078] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[2080] strong ''
								StaticText 'Michael B.'
						[2081] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[2083] time ''
								StaticText '4/22/23'
					[2084] listitem ''
						StaticText 'the best performance and value night view scope'
						[2086] LayoutTable ''
							[2087] LayoutTableRow ''
								[2088] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '100%'
						StaticText 'I need a night view scope hunting and nighttime home security checking. I think this is the best night vision monocular for the money. The size is compact and lightweight, with rubber grips that are nice when wearing gloves on those cold evenings. With this hand-held scope, you can record videos and take photos. I really enjoy this product. So, I give 5 stars for sure.'
						[2099] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[2101] strong ''
								StaticText 'Petit'
						[2102] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[2104] time ''
								StaticText '4/22/23'
					[2105] listitem ''
						StaticText 'Not good at all, not worth the price.'
						[2107] LayoutTable ''
							[2108] LayoutTableRow ''
								[2109] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '40%'
						StaticText "For the price I did not expect perfection, or super duty quality. However the product on the outside seems sturdy and durable, not cheap plastic. The issue surfaces when it you turn it on. The inner screen is an LCD that it is bright as it can be. The image is blurry and horrible, and only after some work with the controls, forgetting the terrible instructions, you figure out it has magnification that it is not practical as it will not co witness with any type of aiming sights. Since I bought it to observe nocturnal wildlife I could care little for co witnessing, but hunters beware.You will need to manually focus, which for the price was expected. If you are not expecting this, and wish to have something that will autofocus, look somewhere else and spend more. You have been warned.To me the biggest problem comes from the fact that the magnification, and the manual adjust exacerbate the flashlight intensity of the screen. Imagine looking at a cell phone screen in pitch darkness, and you have an idea. Can't use it without losing full nightvision on one eye . A muted screen, adapted to night vision, or the ability to lower the screen brightness (that adds no cost to the unit, come on!) would have earned four stars. As it is, it lives in a drawer, reminding me of the wasted money."
						[2120] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[2122] strong ''
								StaticText 'JDR'
						[2123] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[2125] time ''

step_data.thought: I have accessed the reviews section for the ACPOTEL Night Vision Monocular. I can see multiple reviews and their corresponding ratings. I will summarize the ratings based on the reviews provided. The reviews show a general trend of positive feedback, with many customers giving high ratings, such as 100% from several reviewers. Overall, the product appears to have received a favorable reception from customers.
